mapper.select: SELECT * FROM teacher WHERE tname like concat('%', #{tname}, '%') and tno like concat('%', #{tno}, '%')
SELECT Cno, Cname, Cpos, course.Tno, Tname, Ctype, Ccredit, Ccapacity, Cremain, Status FROM (course JOIN teacher ON course.Tno = teacher.Tno) WHERE course.Tno = #{Tno} AND Status = 1
SELECT Cno, Cname, Cpos, course.Tno, Tname, Ctype, Ccredit, Ccapacity, Cremain, Status FROM (course JOIN teacher ON course.Tno = teacher.Tno) WHERE course.Tno=#{Tno} AND Status = 0
